text:
What is a coronavirus?
Coronaviruses are a large family of viruses which may cause illness in animals or humans. In humans, several coronaviruses are known to cause respiratory infections   (1/2) #COVID19Namibia , #Covid19Windhoek #CoronaVirusNamibia #NUSTHackathon
